cantParse.message: FastReader cannot handle the text you selected.

startReadingInfo.message:
To start reading select the text on the page, click the right button and choose FastReader.
You can also use the shortcut Alt+S while the text is selected.

startContentSelectorBtn.message: Select an element on the page

autostartDescr.message: Start reading right after FastReading is launched.

focusModeDescr.message: The focus point is shifted closer to the beginning of a word.

smartSlowingDescr.message: Slow down the speed at a punctuation mark.

emptySentenceEndDescr.message: Insert an «empty word» before the beginning of the next sentence.

entityAnalysisDescr.message: Allows to display common entities as a single word. Performs the analysis of the punctuation. Corrects the basic design of the text.

hyphenationDescr.message: Division of long words into smaller parts.

clickToStart.message: Click the screen or press the spacebar.← the click outside the reading area closes FastReader →
